attributes.additional_details:
The constituent parts that make up the NHS should not be sold off to profit making companies.
If one particular service makes a profit, that profit should be put into patient care, not into shareholders pockets.
attributes.background:
The NHS is paid for by the taxation of the people and corporations of the UK.
It has been built with & is funded by public money.
The NHS should stay in the hands of the people who have paid for it.
The public.
